//   ------------------------- ----- ----

//   RefiningSampleOffsets     c15      2
//   EdgeSampleOffsets         c17      2
//   ShadowModulateColor       c19      1
//   LightPosition             c20      1
//   FalloffParameters         c21      1
//   SceneColorTexture         s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture        s1       1
//   ShadowDepthTexture        s2       1
//   RandomAngleTexture        s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 0.999000013, 1, 0.5, -2
    def c6, 1, -1, 0, 0.25
    def c22, 0.00039999999, -3.99959993, 0.699999988, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_385BCF51_0.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

texldl r8, c220.z, s15
mov r9.xyw, v0
add r8.w, r9.w, -r8.y
mad r9.x, r8.w, r8.x, r9.x

    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r0, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r0.y, r9.w
      mad r0.x, r0.x, r0.y, r9.x
      mov r0.yz, r9.xyww
    else
      mov r0.xyz, r9.xyww
    endif
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    rcp r0.y, r9.w
    mul r0.zw, r0.y, r9.xyxy
    mul r0.zw, r0.x, r0
    mul r1, r0.w, c8

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_385BCF51_0.txt
add r8.w, r0.x, -r8.y
mad r0.z, -r8.w, r8.x, r0.z

    mad r1, c7, r0.z, r1
    mad r1, c9, r0.x, r1
    add r1, r1, c10
    rcp r1.w, r1.w
    mul r2.xy, r1.w, r1
    min r3.z, r1.z, c5.x
    mad r2.zw, r9.xyxy, r0.y, c5.y
    mul r2.zw, r2, c0.xyxy
    mul r2.zw, r2, c5.z
    texld r4, r2.zwzw, s3
    mad_pp r4, r4.yxyx, -c5.w, -c5.y
    mul_pp r5, r4.wzwz, c6.xyxy
    mad r6, r5.zwzw, c17.xxzz, r2.xyxy
    mad_pp r6, r4.zwzw, c17.yyww, r6
    mul r3.xyw, r6.xyzx, c6.xxzz
    texldl_pp r7, r3, s2
    mul r3.xyw, r6.zwzx, c6.xxzz
    texldl r6, r3, s2
    add_pp r0.y, r6.x, r7.x
    mad r2, r5, c18.xxzz, r2.xyxy
    mad_pp r2, r4, c18.yyww, r2
    mov_pp r3.xy, r2
    texldl r4, r3, s2
    add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r4.x
    mov_pp r3.xy, r2.zwzw
    texldl r2, r3, s2
    add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r2.x
    mul_pp r1.z, r0.y, c6.w
    add r2.x, -r0.y, c22.x
    add r0.y, r0.y, c22.y
    cmp r0.y, r0.y, c6.z, c6.x
    cmp r0.y, r2.x, c4.y, r0.y
    if_ne r0.y, -r0.y
      mad_pp r2, r1.xyxy, r1.w, c15
      mov_pp r3.xy, r2
      texldl_pp r4, r3, s2
      mov_pp r3.xy, r2.zwzw
      texldl r2, r3, s2
      add_pp r0.y, r2.x, r4.x
      mad_pp r2, r1.xyxy, r1.w, c16
      mov_pp r3.xy, r2
      texldl r4, r3, s2
      add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r4.x
      mov_pp r3.xy, r2.zwzw
      texldl r2, r3, s2
      add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r2.x
      mad r0.y, r0.y, c6.w, -r1.z
      mad_pp r1.z, r0.y, c22.z, r1.z
    endif
    mul r1.xyw, r0.w, c12.xyzz
    mad r0.yzw, c11.xxyz, r0.z, r1.xxyw
    mad r0.xyz, c13, r0.x, r0.yzww
    add r0.xyz, r0, c14
    add r0.xyz, -r0, c20
    mul r0.xyz, r0, c20.w
    dp3 r0.x, r0, r0
    rsq r0.x, r0.x
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mad r0.x, r0.x, c21.y, c21.z
    max r1.x, r0.x, c4.y
    mad r0.x, r1.x, -r1.x, c5.y
    max r1.x, r0.x, c4.y
    pow_pp r0.x, r1.x, c21.x
    mov r0.y, c5.y
    add r2, -r0.y, c19
    mad_pp r0, r0.x, r2, c5.y
    mul_pp r1.x, r1.z, r1.z
    mul_pp r1.x, r1.z, r1.x
    add_pp r2, -r0, c5.y
    mad_pp oC0, r1.x, r2, r0

// approximately 107 instruction slots used (20 texture, 87 arithmetic)
